data.sent_from: There <are> nine people in my family.

data.sent_from: <Are> you going to put this on Kongregate? "Yes, there is a two-week period where the game will only be available on Armor Games since they're sponsoring it, but I will upload it to Kongregate after that."

data.sent_from: Los Angeles <is> one of the places that I'd like to visit.

data.sent_from: The twelve animals of the Chinese zodiac come from eleven kinds of animals originating in nature, namely the rat, ox, tiger, rabbit, horse, snake, monkey, rooster, dog and pig, as well as the legendary form of the dragon, and <are> used as a calendar.
data.sent_to: I dodici animali dello zodiaco cinese provengono da undici tipi di animali originari in natura, vale a dire il topo, il bue, la tigre, il coniglio, il cavallo, il serpente, la scimmia, il gallo, il cane e il maiale, così come la leggendaria forma del drago, e sono utilizzati come calendario.
